articles.author: Francesca Washtell
articles.title: Tesco faces £2.5bn bill after equal pay court defeat - This is Money
articles.description: The European Court of Justice ruled that an EU law could be used in an employment tribunal being brought against Tesco. The 6,000 workers in the case say the differences in their rates is sexist.
articles.content:
Tesco faces a £2.5billion bill after Europe's top court backed thousands of shop floor workers in a mammoth equal pay lawsuit.
The European Court of Justice (ECJ) ruled that an EU law could be used … [+3828 chars]

articles.author: Lewis Oldham
articles.title: Liverpool star Alexander-Arnold 'ruled out' of Euro 2020 - Football365
articles.description: Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold has suffered a "grade two quad tear" so he will miss out on this summer's European Championships.
articles.content:
Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold will miss out on this summer’s European Championships as he suffered a “grade two quad tear” against Austria.
